dcterms:description: A dataset for semantic urban scene understanding containing finely annotated images of urban street scenes. It includes 2975 train, 500 validation, and 1525 test images, each corresponding to the 20th frame of a 30-frame video clip.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset
